messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Brig Control.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: We are low on the moneys.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: It is advised that if you can try and make things like arcade cabnets and computers so we can sell them and buy more supplys for the jobs you 'Love'

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Delivery Office.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: What's the status of cargo shipping
